channel.title: Course Multistate on Paul C. Lambert
channel.description: Recent content in Course Multistate on Paul C. Lambert

item.title: Course: Competing Risks and multi-state models
item.description:
I am teaching a new three day course with Michael Crowther on competing risks and multi-state models at the Swiss Epidemiology Winter School, 15th-18th January 2018. Details on how to register can be found here.

Practicals will be conducted in Stata, making use of the multistate package in Stata.

We plan to run this course in Leicester and in Stockholm, sometime in 2018.
